title: Warwick Q dealt 418 damage at level 6
body: Warwick Q reporting 160 + 6% of targets max health killed me when I had 418 HP in one hit. I was playing Vlad, and I got my empowered heal off before his bite landed, but I still died. I lost a ranked game to this. I can link proof if anybody cares.

replies.body: Please link as proof to this.
I heard there was a bug that makes WW Q deal double damage sometimes

Did he have predator?  That sounds really high.
Also, heals seem to be a bit wonky in this game.  As warwick I often die mid-Q because the heal goes off after the damage.
Vladimir Q has a travel time to get back to him.  There's a particle.  I'm not sure about WW's explanation.

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=PcwmAWhE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-03-30T12:53:31.238+0000)
>
> Vladimir Q has a travel time to get back to him.  There's a particle.  I'm not sure about WW's explanation.

True but I had the health in me for roughly .33-.5sec. I had 418 HP after healing. The Q actually did about 480. Ill just post the proof if I can find how to.

Here is a demonstration, I will also post the youtube video of MY ranked game if u even care.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XdEm3bLg4kM
418 at level 6? that means you had to be low on health and activated his gotta kill mode . The one where he does extra damage to low health champs.

> [{quoted}](name=DrTeath,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=PcwmAWhE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-30T11:20:27.001+0000)
>
> 418 at level 6? that means you had to be low on health and activated his gotta kill mode . The one where he does extra damage to low health champs.

Is not a thing, his passive grants attack speed. Its a double damage bug and the funny part is how abusable it is.
^ i play a lot of warwick. i love his Q damage/follow. it's very well designed but overall it's balanced. don't stay low health!

120% AD (he has about 108 from my estimation of his runes, and items when you died) which is roughly 130 dmg, then it procs on hits so about 20 from his passive, ~~60% ad from Tiamat (so about 65)~~.  Then there's the 6% of your max HP (which seems to be about 1241 (916 base HP, 200 from kindlegem, 60 from Chrysalis, 65 from Resolve secondary)) which is about 75 dmg.  That all totals to 290 but since you were below 40% life, you took 310 which since he had press the attack it's quite likely you were Vulnerable (9% bonus dmg at 6) which comes to about like 340 but if he procced the third hit to make you vulnerable at the same time sometimes the numbers are funky weird on combining numbers together and added the 81 proc dmg to it which would be about ~~419 ~~304ish damage.

Also, it looks like Master Yi died to him around the same time.  Which if he died first then you got finished off then the numbers come to be about 
117 AD instead of 108 (thank you Coup De Grace)
****
140.4 Q - base dmg
20 - passive
~~70 - Tiamat dmg~~
75 - %hp dmg
~~305.4~~235 dmg > ~~326.8 ~~251.878 after 7% bonus dmg
~~356.2~~274.54702 if vulnerable which would be ~~437.2~~355.54702 damage if Press the Attack procced.

It seems reasonable that you died.  I didn't even include if he cleaved you at the same time which can be easily missed.  

EDIT: Wait Tiamat doesn't apply to it's main target.
